item.title: Summer - Fall 2018 Data Together Reading Group
item.description: The goal of this “syllabus” is to identify some themes that drive Data Together as a project & as a politics, and to find some readings that help us understand those themes better. Themes A view on the decentralized (distributed) web (June 26) ğŸ¬ Recorded Call ğŸ—’ Notes Ownership (July 24) ğŸ¬ Recorded Call ğŸ—’ Notes Commons (August 21) ğŸ¬ Recorded Call ğŸ—’ Notes Centralization as opposed to Decentralization (and peer-to-peer, federation) (September 4)
